alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued January 26 at 8:49AM PST until January 27 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...A period of stagnant air with light winds is expected. * WHERE...Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Central Coast Range of Western Oregon, Central Willamette Valley, South Willamette Valley, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Air stagnation could result in the development and persistence of poor air quality.
info.instruction: People with respiratory illness should follow their physician`s advice for dealing with high levels of air pollution during periods of stagnant air. State air quality agencies highly recommend that no outdoor burning occur and that residential wood burning devices be limited as much as possible. According to state air quality agencies, prolonged periods of stagnant air can hold pollutants close to the ground where people live and breathe. Check with your local burn agency for any current restrictions in your area.

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Central Willamette Valley; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills; South Willamette Valley
